metadata.title: CVE-2024-10468 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Potential race conditions in IndexedDB could have caused memory corruption,leading to a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 132 and Thunderbird < 132.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
